attributes.action: Fund better awareness of and support for people with brain aneurysms
attributes.additional_details:
Unfortunately this isn’t something one person can do. We need GPs to have training, earlier diagnosis can save a life. In America aneurysm awareness month is September and it’s a pretty big deal over there, you’re encouraged to have scans. Symptoms and signs are all over the place. I didn’t even know there was symptoms until now after I’ve lost a loved one.

There needs to be more awareness and more training for GPs!
attributes.background: Provide funding for a campaign to raise awareness of brain aneurysms and fund more training for GPs to diagnose brain aneurysms earlier. I believe this could have the potential to save thousands of lives and support the people who are living with aneurysms.

departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care
